1.text: Here we will guide you on tips and tricks to better secure yourself and your data, outside and inside the World Wide Web!

3.text: When you arrive on the homepage, you'll meet your very own dragon from a randomly chosen egg. This egg will start to hatch and grow every time you type a character into the password field.

4.text: To level up your pet and help it evolve into a full-grown dragon, your password needs to include the following:

7.text: At least one capital letter: A-Z

9.text: The more of these elements you include, the stronger your password — and the stronger your password pet becomes!

11.text: Creating a strong password is great — but remembering it is just as important. Here are a few tips:

12.text: Use phrases or combinations of words that are meaningful to you

13.text: Avoid personal info like birth dates, pet names, or addresses — these are easy to guess or find online

14.text: Try using substitutions, like numbers or symbols in place of letters

16.text: Once you've built your best password, head to the final page and test it against the Boss. Will your password be strong enough to survive the fight?

17.text: Have fun, stay curious, and keep your passwords powerful!
